_contractsignatorysignmodalcontent: By clicking the button you will sign the document $documenttitle$ with the parties and your signature will be registered by the e-signing service Scrive.
_contractsignatorysignmodalcontentauthor: When you've signed the document $documenttitle$ your signature will be registered by the e-signing service Scrive.
_contractsignatorysignmodalcontentdesign: Select eID. When you have selected, the software for signing with eID will be opened.
_contractsignatorysignmodalcontentfromsi: When you have clicked the button, the e-signing service Scrive will register that you have signed.
_couldNotUpload: Sorry, the file could not be uploaded. Please try again or with a different file.
_filladitionfieldsdescription: Please submit additional information about yourself.
_legalparagraphBody: This email contains confidential information and should not be forwarded. Disclosure, copying, distribution or other processing of the information contained in this message is prohibited and may be unlawful. If you have received this in error please notify the sender and delete immediately.
_mailClosedLoginText: The document has also been saved to your Scrive account in your e-archive.
_mailClosedSignup: You can also save a safety copy of the document.
_mailContractClosedContentLinked: The signed document was too large to send to you by email.
_mailContractClosedContentLinkedAccount: The document has been saved to your Scrive account.
_mailContractClosedContentLinkedNoAccoun: It will be available to download until $availabledate$.
_mailContractClosedContentSignedBy: The document $documenttitle$ has been signed by $partylist:noescape()$.
_mailDocumentCorrectionBody:
At $closingtime$ the document $documenttitle$ was signed and we sent you a copy of the document.

We have found that there was a technical issue when the document was finalised by our e-signing system. The issue prevented the e-signing system from sealing the document with a digital signature. The issue has been corrected and the document has now been sealed with a digital signature.

Find the document with the new digital signature attached. To avoid future confusion please keep this document and discard the previous version.

If you are interested to learn more about the purpose of digital signatures we recommend this article: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_signature
_mailDocumentLinked: The document was too large to attach to this email. It will be available to download until $availabledate$.
_mailInvitationToSignContractDefaultHead: $creatorname$ has invited you to sign the document $documenttitle$ electronically through Scrive E-sign.
_mailInvitationToViewDefaultHeader: $creatorname$ has invited you to review the document $documenttitle$.
_mailRejectMailContentRejected:
$rejectorName$ has rejected signing the document $documenttitle$. The signing process has therefore been cancelled by the Scrive system.

Please log in to your account to edit and restart the process.
_mismatchOnNameAndCanChange: The name given in the document does not match your eID.
_mismatchOnNameAndCantChange: The name given in the document does not match your eID. Please contact the document sender.
_mismatchOnNameAndNumberCanChange: The name and the ID no. given in the document do not match your eID.
_mismatchOnNameAndNumberCantChange: The name and the ID no. given in the document do not match your eID. Please contact the sender.
_mismatchOnNumberAndCanChange: The ID no. given in the document does not match your eID.
_mismatchOnNumberAndCantChange: The ID no. given in the document does not match your eID. Please contact the document sender.
_padDrawSignatureBoxHeader: Draw your signature within the box
_pageDocumentForSignContentElegBody: No eID? You can download an eID from your online bank or from Telia. Click here to read more.
_pinWillBeSentTo: The PIN will be sent by SMS to
_remindMailNotSignedContractBody: $authorname$ would like to remind you that you have not yet signed the document $documenttitle$.
_remindMailSignedContractStandardHeaderS: You have previously signed the document $documenttitle$ through Scrive E-sign. $creatorname$ has requested we resend the document $documenttitle$ to you.
_sessionTimedoutInSignview: Your session has timed out. You can access your document again by following the link in your email.
_sessionTimedoutInSignviewAfterHistoryBa: In order to proceed, you need to click the invitation link again.
_signElegFailed: We're experiencing difficulties handling your eID.
_signViewSigAttachmentBoxChooseFile: Select a PDF or image file
_signingErrorMessage1: We're experiencing difficulties handling your document.
_signingInProgressDontCloseWindow: We are still saving your signature. If you leave this page we may not be able to finish the process.
_signviewAttachmentUploadedInOtherWindow: Sorry, we are unable to upload your file because this document is open in another window. Please reload your page to continue.
_signviewSigningFailed: Sorry, something went wrong while signing the document. Please try again.
_smsInvitationToSign: Hi, $creatorname$ has invited you to e-sign. Click here to start: $link$
_smsRejectNotification: Hi $personname$, $rejectorName$ has rejected to sign the document $documenttitle$. The signing process has therefore been canceled. Follow the link to view the document: $link$
_smsReminder: Hi $personname$, this is a reminder from $creatorname$ that you have not yet signed the document $documenttitle$. Open the link to review the document: $link$
_smsReminderSigned: Hi $personname$, the signed document $documenttitle$ has been resent to you at the request of $creatorname$. Find the document by following this link: $link$
_subtitleSignedClosedByEmail: The signed document has been sent to you by email.
_subtitleSignedClosedByEmailMobile: The signed document has been sent to you by email and SMS.
_subtitleSignedClosedByMobile: The signed document has been sent to you by SMS
_subtitleSignedNotClosedByEmail: When every party has signed the finalised document will be sent to you by email.
_subtitleSignedNotClosedByEmailMobile: When every party has signed the finalised document will be sent to you by email and SMS.
_subtitleSignedNotClosedByMobile: When every party has signed the finalised document will be sent to you by SMS.
_unavailableForSign: The document is no longer available for signing
